title: INDIAN INSTITUTE OF TECHNOLOGY (INDIAN SCHOOL OF MINES) DHANBAD
paragraphs: Shri Santosh Kumar Gangwar Hon'ble Governor of Jharkhand
Padma Bhushan Shri VK Saraswat Member, NITI Aayog

I believe profoundly in the strength and promise of IIT(ISM) Dhanbad. It is curiosity that fosters the growth of a community, making it unique. Curiosity and accuracy are essential for knowledge, wisdom, intelligence, and stability; therefore, let this methodical and comprehensive way of thinking serve as a guide and inspiration for our endeavours.
Together, let us embrace the future with curiosity and determination. I look forward to witnessing the remarkable contributions our community will make to society.
“उत्तिष्ठत जाग्रत प्राप्य वरान्निबोधत ।”
( Arise, awake, and stop not till the goal is reached!)
Where creativity pulsates...
A legacy built on more than nine decades of excellence and inventiveness
There are a number of undergraduate programmes leading to 4-year B.Tech., 5-year Integrated M.Tech., Dual Degree and Double Major.
The Institute offers a number of postgraduate programmes leading to Master’s degree (M.Sc., M.Sc. (Tech), M.Tech. and MBA).
The Institute offers PhD programmes.
Fostering inventiveness, imagination, and curiosity for a lifetime
Cost effective multi armed drilling equipment for open cast mines.
Power efficient and cost effective system for mining vehicles.
Low noise next generation airfoil for aircrafts, turbine blades, fan blades.
Water-repellent, eco-friendly and cost effective jute.

title: IIT (ISM) Dhanbad
paragraphs:
Standing tall since early decades of 20th century, the
                                                institute is steadily sailing through the millennium change and has
                                                emerged into one of the most prominent institution- Indian Institute of
                                                Technology IIT(ISM) with full bloom functioning of 18 branches of
                                                Engineering, Applied Sciences, Management Studies and Humanities. IIT
                                                (ISM) has had a centenary long credentials of outperforming
                                                achievements/contributions in academia and the industry.

Office of International Relations & Alumni Affairs (IR&AA) is the
                                                primary co-ordinating center for communication, events and other
                                                activities on behalf of the Associate Dean, International Relations &
                                                Alumni Affairs (IR&AA). It is located in ISM, Dhanbad. The Office along
                                                with the Students' Alumni Cell and ISM Alumni Association (ISMAA)
                                                organizes the Annual Alumni Meet, Basant Samman, Distinguished Alumni
                                                Awards (during Convocation) and other alumni related events.

Research has revealed the carcinogenic effects of exposure to trihalomethanes found in drinking water generated due to chlorination of water.

title: IIT (ISM) Dhanbad
paragraphs: Standing tall since early decades of 20th century, the institute is steadily sailing through the millennium change and has emerged into one of the most prominent institution- Indian Institute of Technology IIT(ISM) with full bloom functioning of 18 branches of Engineering, Applied Sciences, Management Studies and Humanities. IIT (ISM) has had a centenary long credentials of outperforming achievements/contributions in academia and the industry.

Office of International Relations & Alumni Affairs (IR&AA) is the primary co-ordinating center for communication, events and other activities on behalf of the Associate Dean, International Relations & Alumni Affairs (IR&AA). It is located in ISM, Dhanbad. The Office along with the Students' Alumni Cell and ISM Alumni Association (ISMAA) organizes the Annual Alumni Meet, Basant Samman, Distinguished Alumni Awards (during Convocation) and other alumni related events.

title: IIT (ISM) Dhanbad
paragraphs: Standing tall since early decades of 20th century, the institute is steadily sailing through the millennium change and has emerged into one of the most prominent institution- Indian Institute of Technology IIT(ISM) with full bloom functioning of 18 branches of Engineering, Applied Sciences, Management Studies and Humanities. IIT (ISM) has had a centenary long credentials of outperforming achievements/contributions in academia and the industry.

The Indian Institute of Technology (Indian School of Mines) constituted under Institute of Technology Act, 1961 is administered through IIT Council-the apex body, Government of India under the Chairmanship of Honourable Minister, MHRD for uniform and smooth governance of Pan-IIT in our country.

Office of International Relations & Alumni Affairs (IR&AA) is the primary co-ordinating center for communication, events and other activities on behalf of the Associate Dean, International Relations & Alumni Affairs (IR&AA). It is located in ISM, Dhanbad. title: IIT (ISM) Dhanbad
paragraphs: Standing tall since early decades of 20th century, the institute is steadily sailing through the millennium change and has emerged into one of the most prominent institution- Indian Institute of Technology IIT(ISM) with full bloom functioning of 18 branches of Engineering, Applied Sciences, Management Studies and Humanities. IIT (ISM) has had a centenary long credentials of outperforming achievements/contributions in academia and the industry.

Office of International Relations & Alumni Affairs (IR&AA) is the primary co-ordinating center for communication, events and other activities on behalf of the Associate Dean, International Relations & Alumni Affairs (IR&AA). It is located in ISM, Dhanbad. The Office along with the Students' Alumni Cell and ISM Alumni Association (ISMAA) organizes the Annual Alumni Meet, Basant Samman, Distinguished Alumni Awards (during Convocation) and other alumni related events.

title: IIT (ISM), DHANBAD | INDIAN INSTITUTE OF TECHNOLOGY (INDIAN SCHOOL OF MINES), DHANBAD
paragraphs: …standing tall since early decades of 20th century, the institute is steadily sailing through the millennium change and has emerged into one of the most prominent institution- Indian Institute of Technology IIT(ISM) with full bloom functioning of 18 branches of Engineering, Applied Sciences, Management Studies and Humanities.  IIT (ISM) has had a centenary long credentials of outperforming achievements/contributions in academia and the industry.

The Indian Institute of Technology (Indian School of Mines) constituted under Institute of Technology Act, 1961 is administered through IIT Council-the apex body, Government of India under the Chairmanship of Honourable Minister, MoHRD for uniform and smooth governance of Pan-IIT in our country.

Further, Indian Institute of Technology (Indian School of Mines) functions under tandem administrative guidance of Board of Governors (BoG) & Finance Committee (FC) headed by Chairman and Director, IIT(ISM) as its member.

Academic administration is the domain of Senate constituted of all the Professors of IIT(ISM) and few other nominated members from reputed organizations. Director, IIT(ISM) is the ex-officio Chairman. The Senate helps in structuring the course-curriculum, research activities and all other academic activities towards creating a learning ambience in the institute and to facilitate overall academic excellence.

IIT(ISM) offers thirteen 4-years B.Tech programmes in various branches of Engineering like Chemical, Civil, Computer Science & Engineering, Electrical, Electronics & Communication, Electronics & Instrumentation, Engineering Physics, Environmental Science & Engineering, Mechanical, Fuel & Mineral, Mining Machinery, Mining and Petroleum. It also offers 5- years Dual Degree (B.Tech + M.Tech)  Programme in Computer Science & Engineering.  Besides, it offers 5 years Integrated M.Tech Programme in Applied Geology & Applied Geophysics and Mathematics & Computing.  The Institutes also offers 3-years Masters programmes viz. MSc. (Tech) in Applied Geology & Applied Geophysics, 2-years M.Sc. Programmes in Chemistry, Physics, Mathematics & Computing. It offers higher degrees in Management and Humanities as well, in addition to PhD & PDF in various streams.

IIT(ISM) Dhanbad adopts a total transparent admission process ; B.Tech. through JEE (Advanced) and M. Tech. through GATE conducted at Pan-India level. Admissions to MBA programmes are done on valid CAT/ GMAT Score.  However, students from foreign countries are admitted through sponsorships of the respective embassy.

The Office of the Dean (Research and Development) drives strategic planning and provide guidance across academic and research programs, fostering new and interdisciplinary research initiatives and collaborations

title: IIT (ISM), DHANBAD | INDIAN INSTITUTE OF TECHNOLOGY (INDIAN SCHOOL OF MINES), DHANBAD
paragraphs: …standing tall since early decades of 20th century, the institute is steadily sailing through the millennium change and has emerged into one of the most prominent institution- Indian Institute of Technology IIT(ISM) with full bloom functioning of 18 branches of Engineering, Applied Sciences, Management Studies and Humanities.  IIT (ISM) has had a centenary long credentials of outperforming achievements/contributions in academia and the industry.

The Indian Institute of Technology (Indian School of Mines) constituted under Institute of Technology Act, 1961 is administered through IIT Council-the apex body, Government of India under the Chairmanship of Honourable Minister, MoHRD for uniform and smooth governance of Pan-IIT in our country.

Further, Indian Institute of Technology (Indian School of Mines) functions under tandem administrative guidance of Board of Governors (BoG) & Finance Committee (FC) headed by Chairman and Director, IIT(ISM) as its member.

Academic administration is the domain of Senate constituted of all the Professors of IIT(ISM) and few other nominated members from reputed organizations. Director, IIT(ISM) is the ex-officio Chairman. The Senate helps in structuring the course-curriculum, research activities and all other academic activities towards creating a learning ambience in the institute and to facilitate overall academic excellence.

IIT(ISM) offers thirteen 4-years B.Tech programmes in various branches of Engineering like Chemical, Civil, Computer Science & Engineering, Electrical, Electronics & Communication, Electronics & Instrumentation, Engineering Physics, Environmental Science & Engineering, Mechanical, Fuel & Mineral, Mining Machinery, Mining and Petroleum. It also offers 5- years Dual Degree (B.Tech + M.Tech)  Programme in Computer Science & Engineering.  Besides, it offers 5 years Integrated M.Tech Programme in Applied Geology & Applied Geophysics and Mathematics & Computing.  The Institutes also offers 3-years Masters programmes viz. MSc. (Tech) in Applied Geology & Applied Geophysics, 2-years M.Sc. Programmes in Chemistry, Physics, Mathematics & Computing. It offers higher degrees in Management and Humanities as well, in addition to PhD & PDF in various streams.

IIT(ISM) Dhanbad adopts a total transparent admission process ; B.Tech. through JEE (Advanced) and M. Tech. through GATE conducted at Pan-India level. Admissions to MBA programmes are done on valid CAT/ GMAT Score.  However, students from foreign countries are admitted through sponsorships of the respective embassy.

The Office of the Dean (Research and Development) drives strategic planning and provide guidance across academic and research programs, fostering new and interdisciplinary research initiatives and collaborations

title: IIT (ISM) Dhanbad
paragraphs: Standing tall since early decades of 20th century, the institute is steadily sailing through the millennium change and has emerged into one of the most prominent institution- Indian Institute of Technology IIT(ISM) with full bloom functioning of 18 branches of Engineering, Applied Sciences, Management Studies and Humanities. IIT (ISM) has had a centenary long credentials of outperforming achievements/contributions in academia and the industry.

Office of International Relations & Alumni Affairs (IR&AA) is the primary co-ordinating center for communication, events and other activities on behalf of the Associate Dean, International Relations & Alumni Affairs (IR&AA). It is located in ISM, Dhanbad. The Office along with the Students' Alumni Cell and ISM Alumni Association (ISMAA) organizes the Annual Alumni Meet, Basant Samman, Distinguished Alumni Awards (during Convocation) and other alumni related events.

Shastri Research Student Fellowship (SRSF) 2020-21- Awarded to Sri Anupam Patel an integrated M.Tech. student of department of Applied Geophysics.
Mr. Sagnik Biswas, Phd Scholar, Dept. of Applied Geophysics has received the prestigious Prime Minister's Research Fellowship May, 2020 cycle.
Prof. Rajeev Kumar Ranjan has been sanctioned  SHASTRI INSTITUTIONAL COLLABORATIVE RESEARCH GRANT (SICRG) 2020-21  on COVID related project.

Dr Roshan Kumar Singh, Research Scholar, Department of AGP  has been offered a Post Doctoral Fellowship at the prestigious Earthquake Research Institute, The University of Tokyo, Japan.
Prof. Ravi Gangwar, Dept. of ECE has received IETE- Smt. Ranjana Pal Memorial Award (2020).

Prof. Raghavendra Chaudhary, Dept. of Electronics Engineering has been selected for the prestigious IETE - IRSI (83) Young Scientist Award, 2020 for outstanding contribution in the field of Antenna Design & Applications.
Prof Parthasarathi Das, Dept. of Chemistry has been admitted as a Fellow of the Royal Society of Chemistry (FRSC).

Prof. Shalivahan, Dept. of Applied Geophysics has been awarded with VAJRA (Visiting Advanced Joint Research) Faculty scheme by DST under SERB.
Dr. Andre Revil from Univ. Savoie Mont-blanc Isterre (CNRS), Paris, France will be hosted as VAJRA faculty.
Prof G. K. Vishwakarma, Dept of Math & Computing, has been selected as country (India)  representative for the Committee of Young Statisticians-International Statistical Institute, Netherlands.
Mr. Udit Pant (Ad. No. 19PR0008), a JRF, Dept. of Physics, has been selected as the Early Career Marie Curie Fellow at Queen's University in Belfast, the United Kingdom, for the year (2020-2023).

IIT(ISM) has been ranked 26th in the QS Global University Rankings in Engineering - Mineral & Mining & it is India's SECOND Highest Ranked University by Subject.
A legacy built on more than nine decades of excellence and inventiveness
There are a number of undergraduate programmes leading to 4-year B.Tech., 5-year Integrated M.Tech., Dual Degree and Double Major.
The Institute offers a number of postgraduate programmes leading to Master’s degree (M.Sc., M.Sc. (Tech), M.Tech. and MBA).
The Institute offers PhD programmes.
Fostering inventiveness, imagination, and curiosity for a lifetime

IIT(ISM) Dhanbad has revealed that the shrinking of transboundary rivers across the world because of disappearing tributaries and streams is leading to unpredictable climate and loss of agriculture productivity.
IIT(ISM) Dhanbad will carry out research on Coal Bed Methane (CBM), in collaboration with the Directorate General of Hydrocarbons.
IIT (ISM) Dhanbad mining engineering research unit has discovered measures to prevent fire and explosion in mines and ensure better safety.
Research has revealed the carcinogenic effects of exposure to trihalomethanes found in drinking water generated due to chlorination of water.
Keeping abreast of the latest

IIT(ISM) delights in sharing that Dr. Prakash Kumar, Batch of 1997, Dept. of Applied Geophysics has been appointed as the Director, CSIR - National Geophysical Research Institute (NGRI), Hyderabad on 17 Nov, 2022.

Padma Shri Prof. Harsh K Gupta, Batch of 1963, Dept. of Applied Geophysics has been elected as a foreign member in Russian Academy of Sciences for his outstanding contribution in the field of Geophysics.

title: IIT (ISM), DHANBAD | INDIAN INSTITUTE OF TECHNOLOGY (INDIAN SCHOOL OF MINES), DHANBAD
paragraphs: …standing tall since early decades of 20th century, the institute is steadily sailing through the millennium change and has emerged into one of the most prominent institution- Indian Institute of Technology IIT(ISM) with full bloom functioning of 18 branches of Engineering, Applied Sciences, Management Studies and Humanities.  IIT (ISM) has had a centenary long credentials of outperforming achievements/contributions in academia and the industry.

The Indian Institute of Technology (Indian School of Mines) constituted under Institute of Technology Act, 1961 is administered through IIT Council-the apex body, Government of India under the Chairmanship of Honourable Minister, MoHRD for uniform and smooth governance of Pan-IIT in our country.

Further, Indian Institute of Technology (Indian School of Mines) functions under tandem administrative guidance of Board of Governors (BoG) & Finance Committee (FC) headed by Chairman and Director, IIT(ISM) as its member.

Academic administration is the domain of Senate constituted of all the Professors of IIT(ISM) and few other nominated members from reputed organizations. Director, IIT(ISM) is the ex-officio Chairman. The Senate helps in structuring the course-curriculum, research activities and all other academic activities towards creating a learning ambience in the institute and to facilitate overall academic excellence.

IIT(ISM) offers thirteen 4-years B.Tech programmes in various branches of Engineering like Chemical, Civil, Computer Science & Engineering, Electrical, Electronics & Communication, Electronics & Instrumentation, Engineering Physics, Environmental Science & Engineering, Mechanical, Fuel & Mineral, Mining Machinery, Mining and Petroleum. It also offers 5- years Dual Degree (B.Tech + M.Tech)  Programme in Computer Science & Engineering.  Besides, it offers 5 years Integrated M.Tech Programme in Applied Geology & Applied Geophysics and Mathematics & Computing.  The Institutes also offers 3-years Masters programmes viz. MSc. (Tech) in Applied Geology & Applied Geophysics, 2-years M.Sc. Programmes in Chemistry, Physics, Mathematics & Computing. It offers higher degrees in Management and Humanities as well, in addition to PhD & PDF in various streams.

IIT(ISM) Dhanbad adopts a total transparent admission process ; B.Tech. through JEE (Advanced) and M. Tech. through GATE conducted at Pan-India level. Admissions to MBA programmes are done on valid CAT/ GMAT Score.  However, students from foreign countries are admitted through sponsorships of the respective embassy.

The Office of the Dean (Research and Development) drives strategic planning and provide guidance across academic and research programs, fostering new and interdisciplinary research initiatives and collaborations

title: IIT (ISM) Dhanbad
paragraphs: Standing tall since early decades of 20th century, the institute is steadily sailing through the millennium change and has emerged into one of the most prominent institution- Indian Institute of Technology IIT(ISM) with full bloom functioning of 18 branches of Engineering, Applied Sciences, Management Studies and Humanities. IIT (ISM) has had a centenary long credentials of outperforming achievements/contributions in academia and the industry.

Office of International Relations & Alumni Affairs (IR&AA) is the primary co-ordinating center for communication, events and other activities on behalf of the Associate Dean, International Relations & Alumni Affairs (IR&AA). It is located in ISM, Dhanbad. The Office along with the Students' Alumni Cell and ISM Alumni Association (ISMAA) organizes the Annual Alumni Meet, Basant Samman, Distinguished Alumni Awards (during Convocation) and other alumni related events.

paragraphs: Standing tall since early decades of 20th century, the institute is steadily sailing through the millennium change and has emerged into one of the most prominent institution- Indian Institute of Technology IIT(ISM) with full bloom functioning of 18 branches of Engineering, Applied Sciences, Management Studies and Humanities. IIT (ISM) has had a centenary long credentials of outperforming achievements/contributions in academia and the industry.

Office of International Relations & Alumni Affairs (IR&AA) is the primary co-ordinating center for communication, events and other activities on behalf of the Associate Dean, International Relations & Alumni Affairs (IR&AA). It is located in ISM, Dhanbad. The Office along with the Students' Alumni Cell and ISM Alumni Association (ISMAA) organizes the Annual Alumni Meet, Basant Samman, Distinguished Alumni Awards (during Convocation) and other alumni related events.

title: INDIAN INSTITUTE OF TECHNOLOGY (INDIAN SCHOOL OF MINES) DHANBAD
paragraphs: I believe profoundly in the strength and promise of IIT(ISM) Dhanbad. It is curiosity that fosters the growth of a community, making it unique. Curiosity and accuracy are essential for knowledge, wisdom, intelligence, and stability; therefore, let this methodical and comprehensive way of thinking serve as a guide and inspiration for our endeavours.
Together, let us embrace the future with curiosity and determination. I look forward to witnessing the remarkable contributions our community will make to society.
“उत्तिष्ठत जाग्रत प्राप्य वरान्निबोधत ।”
( Arise, awake, and stop not till the goal is reached!)

title: IIT (ISM) Dhanbad
paragraphs:
Standing tall since early decades of 20th century, the
                                                institute is steadily sailing through the millennium change and has
                                                emerged into one of the most prominent institution- Indian Institute of
                                                Technology IIT(ISM) with full bloom functioning of 18 branches of
                                                Engineering, Applied Sciences, Management Studies and Humanities. IIT
                                                (ISM) has had a centenary long credentials of outperforming
                                                achievements/contributions in academia and the industry.

Office of International Relations & Alumni Affairs (IR&AA) is the
                                                primary co-ordinating center for communication, events and other
                                                activities on behalf of the Associate Dean, International Relations &
                                                Alumni Affairs (IR&AA). It is located in ISM, Dhanbad. The Office along
                                                with the Students' Alumni Cell and ISM Alumni Association (ISMAA)
                                                organizes the Annual Alumni Meet, Basant Samman, Distinguished Alumni
                                                Awards (during Convocation) and other alumni related events.

title: IIT (ISM) Dhanbad
paragraphs: Standing tall since early decades of 20th century, the institute is steadily sailing through the millennium change and has emerged into one of the most prominent institution- Indian Institute of Technology IIT(ISM) with full bloom functioning of 18 branches of Engineering, Applied Sciences, Management Studies and Humanities. IIT (ISM) has had a centenary long credentials of outperforming achievements/contributions in academia and the industry.

Office of International Relations & Alumni Affairs (IR&AA) is the primary co-ordinating center for communication, events and other activities on behalf of the Associate Dean, International Relations & Alumni Affairs (IR&AA). It is located in ISM, Dhanbad. The Office along with the Students' Alumni Cell and ISM Alumni Association (ISMAA) organizes the Annual Alumni Meet, Basant Samman, Distinguished Alumni Awards (during Convocation) and other alumni related events.
